short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Mark the pages you visit and manage them easily with GetMark.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Unlock the full potential of your online research and productivity with GetMark, the ultimate note-taking companion for your browser. Whether you’re a student, professional, or just someone who loves to keep things organized, GetMark is designed to enhance your note-taking experience seamlessly.

Key Features:
•	Quick Note-Taking: Instantly capture notes while browsing any webpage. Just click on the GetMark icon, jot down your thoughts, and save them without leaving the page.
•	Organized Dashboard: View and manage all your notes from a single, user-friendly dashboard. Filter and search notes by keywords, URLs, or tags to find exactly what you need in seconds.
•	Tag Management: Organize your notes with customizable tags. Easily add, edit, and delete tags to keep your notes sorted and easily accessible.
•	Smart Filtering: Use powerful filters to quickly locate notes based on specific criteria such as text content, URL, and associated tags.
•	Sorting Options: Sort your notes by time, alphabetically, or by custom order to view them in a way that suits your workflow best.

How It Works:
1.	Take Notes: Click the GetMark icon in your browser toolbar to start taking notes on any webpage.
2.	View Dashboard: Access your dashboard by clicking the GetMark icon and selecting “View Notes”. Here, you can search, filter, and manage all your notes.
3.	Manage Tags: Add custom tags to categorize your notes. Click on tags in the dashboard to filter notes by specific topics or categories.
4.	Sort and Filter: Use the sorting and filtering options in the dashboard to find your notes quickly and efficiently.

Who Can Benefit?
•	Students: Capture important points during online research, lectures, or while reading articles.
•	Professionals: Keep track of meeting notes, project details, and useful web resources.
•	Researchers: Organize and retrieve references, ideas, and insights with ease.
•	Everyone: Improve your daily productivity by keeping all your notes organized and accessible.
Experience the convenience of having all your notes organized and within reach, right from your browser. Download GetMark today and revolutionize the way you take and manage notes online!
